website_summaries.verdict: Poor low-light performance hinders the Panasonic Lumix DMC-LZ5's useful features.

customer_reviews.title: Great little point and shoot
customer_reviews.text: 2nd one ive owned. Great little point and shoot. Clear images. FAST and 6x zoom very handy! Just learn ur settings for rapid photos of moving children or etc. No it doesn't compare to my larger better cameras, but is the gem of it's class. The megapixel it has is perfect for home and vacation shots just like TZ series. This is my second one and i love it. Great family or trip or daily take w you camera!
customer_reviews.author: greg c

customer_reviews.title: One of the best out there
customer_reviews.text: The camera is very versitile, I bought it for it's manual features, retro look, and slightly larger size. This camera is by no means big, and bulky, but, I don't feel like I will loose it easily, or due to it being so small, forget I put it somewhere and sit on it! It was recommened to me buy serveral photo students, and it produces well. It is the sort of camera I could see becoming a very cool, keeper that in the near future will become one that is sot after. With the upgraded one gig card, holds over 300, 6 meg shots! Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: That Guy

customer_reviews.title: Great while it lasted.
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for a few years but then the dial on the top stopped turning. That's the dial you use for the various types of photos you want to take: economy, video, etc. Photos were awesome though.
customer_reviews.author: animalangel1

customer_reviews.title: Good camera, misses some features.
customer_reviews.text: This camera is nice. Looks good, and has the feel of a "normal" camera. If you want those very thin cameras, this is not the one for you. Exposure and color balance are very consistent, both indoors and outdoors. Anti-jitter works well, but tends to produce somewhat grainy pictures. Better keep your hand steady, specially if you use the 8.3x (max) zoom. It's a shame, though, that it doesn't include preferential aperture and exposure time modes. Sometimes, automatic just won't do what you want. Batteries compartment tends to open if you carry the camera in your pocket, so be sure to buy a case with it.
customer_reviews.author: R. R. NOVAES

customer_reviews.title: Great camera for regular user
customer_reviews.text: I have been using it for almost a month and it has worked perfectly. My only complain is that the batteries that it includes lasts less that the middle of time that it says. However, you can replace them with Alcalina which works good. Great product for a regular user.
customer_reviews.author: Gerardo

customer_reviews.title: ... I lost that had a Leica Lens and was glad that this one is just as good
customer_reviews.text: bought this camera to replace one that I lost that had a Leica Lens and was glad that this one is just as good. love it!
customer_reviews.author: smsully

customer_reviews.title: A very good pick for a compact digital camera with a respectable about of zoom.
customer_reviews.text: A very good pick for a compact digital camera with a respectable about of zoom. It's also from a respectable name that makes a number of good cameras.
customer_reviews.author: Richard O. Mccoy

customer_reviews.title: great camera
customer_reviews.text: the camera is good for the price you pay. Stabilization is great. pictures are crisp and clear. zoom rocks !!!
customer_reviews.author: Jamslam

customer_reviews.title: Terrible value and camera!
customer_reviews.text: This camera took blurry pictures and the flash took so long to recharge that you lost valuable pictures! I would NOT recommend this camera!!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah King

customer_reviews.title: OIS really works
customer_reviews.text: Camera takes excellent pictures. I took all those pictures and have'nt even looked at the manual yet. I'm also a novice novice. pros: Good battery life and great macro ability. The OIS is excellent with low light especially zoom. Really bright LCD Cons: 80000pixel display not sharp enough for me But for the price with all these features i would'nt go with anything else.
customer_reviews.author: D. madden

customer_reviews.title: Good digital
customer_reviews.text: This camera is good for point and shoot. However when in auto the pictures seem to have a lot of noise. I think this is one of the main problem with Panasonic sensor; Even when I fix the iso at 80, there seems to be a lot noise. The camera takes good pictures at sufficient light. I am especially impressed by the movie mode. It can take really good quality movie at 30 fps. Overall at this price I think it is a good camera.
customer_reviews.author: R. Karmakar

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat for the price.......
customer_reviews.text: I have owned this camera for a little over a month now, and Love it......with the features it has, and price, it is tough to find a better buy..... Only negative of this camera is, as stated in another review and magazine reviews, if using the high sensativity mode, blowing up the pics to poster size is not a good idea......won't come out well at all...... But besides that, the pitures taken with this camera are excellent quality, and it is very easy to use.... I would defiently suggest this camera, the chances of finding a better camera at this price is almost impossible.......
customer_reviews.author: Frank J. Romolo

customer_reviews.title: Great zoom, Great color. Great Image Stabilizer, Little noise
customer_reviews.text: This product has got great zoom 6x (compared to other compacts), great and accurate color. The Image stabilizer is rare in models in this price range. Only cons, little noise. At 6.3MP really did not matter to me as I print in A4 or Letter. Oh yes, and movie quality is also really good. zoom cannot be changed while movie recording is going on.
customer_reviews.author: Shouvik Basu

customer_reviews.title: Good Camera, Nice Quality
customer_reviews.text: Though it is my very first digital camera, but I think in first buy itself I made a wise decision. :-) Initially I was bit scared while buying it over well know products Canon/Sony. Picture quality is very good, zoom works pretty fine though couldn't make out till now how to make the optimal use of both digital & optical zoom combinedly. Dim light is not atall a problem with this camera. Even the night pictures are as bright as day light pictures. Yet to explore the other features of this, but in the last 2 days it seems to be a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Raj Goel

customer_reviews.title: Panasonic Lumix DMC LZ5K
customer_reviews.text: Excellent for a small compact digitial camera. Good zoom. Pixels moe than adequate. Enlarged some photos to 11x24 without any loss. Good use of battery time. Only wish it had a view finder in addition to LCD screen.
customer_reviews.author: Ann E. Defenbaugh

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT CAMERA, BUT DON'T BUY
customer_reviews.text: look for the "Panasonic Lumix DMC-LZ7K 7.2MP Digital Camera with 6x Image Stabilized Zoom (Black)", you can get it for less price and it is obviously better!
customer_reviews.author: Z. Rojas Llobet

customer_reviews.title: camera for every day life
customer_reviews.text: I am really satisfied about the performance of this camera: the Lumix lenses deserve all the best compliments. It can be used for evey situations and nevertheless being a simple compact camera reach high performance.
customer_reviews.author: Lorenzo Lisciani

customer_reviews.title: Panasonic LUMIX
customer_reviews.text: The camera is perfectly that I like, but your offered me with the purchase a memory 1gb free and did not send it to me. Con la compra de esta camara Uds ofrecian una memoria de 1g gratis, pero esta no me fue enviada. Quisiera saber porque?
customer_reviews.author: Juan Verde

customer_reviews.title: Great Cam
customer_reviews.text: This camera is great. Got it in the mail the other day and now cant stop taking photos. The photos are very clear, and the optical zoom is great. Way better then the previous Kodak we had.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Dole

product_meta.title: Panasonic Lumix DMC-LZ5K 6MP Digital Camera with 6x Image Stabilized Zoom (Black)
product_meta.description: MD) CL) U) PAN DMC-LZ5K BLK DIG
feature_bullets: Widescreen 16 - 9 Mode for Panoramic Images lets you shoot images in widescreen (16 - 9 aspect ratio), so that you can achieve bold, panoramic images, and view photos as full screen images on your widescreen TV

Snap Off Consecutive Shots at 3 Frames per Second! You can take up to 5 images in Standard Mode and 3 images in Fine Mode with full resolution. In addition, the Unlimited Consecutive Shooting function lets you continue shooting until the memory card or built-in memory is full.
6x Optical Zoom in a Compact Body - Use the 6x optical zoom (without the extended optical zoom) together with the 4x digital zoom to enjoy up to 24x zoom power.

Two Convenient Power Sources--Alkaline or Rechargeable Batteries - It can be powered by two AA alkaline or two rechargeable nickel-metal hydride (Ni-MH) batteries. Two Panasonic Oxyride batteries are included, that allow you to take up to 235 photos. Alkaline batteries let you take about 175 photos and nickel-metal hydride batteries allow up to 390 photos.
Built-In Memory--Shoot Even When You Don't Have an SD Memory Card - The built-in memory holds up to 14MB of image data, which you can later upload to an SD Memory Card or PC.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.4 out of 5 stars29 ratings3.4 out of 5 stars
